title: Will Samsung S21 have similar discount to S20?
content:
I was about to upgrade my old moto 4 to Samsung Galaxy S20 on Fi Buy Phone page, shows good discount.  But heard s21 is out in a few weeks.    Is there any idea if S21 will appear as Fi option  and have discount?
If not, does anyone know if S20 price was recently dropped?   (to clear out s20s, indicating s21 will not have discount)   Thanks
